roleset.name: to ask about

example.name: criminal investigation
example.text: Typically , these laws seek to prevent [executive branch officials]-2 from [*-2] inquiring into whether certain federal programs make any economic sense or proposing more market-oriented alternatives to regulations .
example.arg: into whether certain federal programs make any economic sense

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Aureal inquired, as the two men walked along.
example.arg: as the two men walked along.

example.name: Agent and topic, no recipient
example.text: I inquired, at the top of my voice, where the hell I was.
example.arg: at the top of my voice

example.name: Agent and Recipient, no topic
example.text: He-1 caught a young man of the men of Succoth, and *trace*-1 inquired of him.

example.name: All args
example.text: Theodosius inquired of him the practices of the Studite monks.
example.arg: the practices of the Studite monks.

roleset.note: Roleset by Julia based on WSJ and internet searches. Member of Vncls inquire-37.1.2. Comparison to "ask".
